TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlElementAttributes extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of objects used by the to override the default way it serializes a class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The XmlElementAttributes is returned by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlElements%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> class. By using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> class and the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> class, you can override the default way that the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class.
## Examples The following example serializes the `Transportation` class, which contains a single field named `Vehicles` that returns an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>. The example first applies two instances of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> class to the `Vehicles` field that specifies the types of objects the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> inserts into the array. The example then creates two <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> objects to override the behavior of the attributes applied to the `Vehicles` property. The two overriding objects are added to the XmlElementAttributes collection of an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>. Lastly, the example adds the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>, allowing the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to insert the new object types into the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> returned by the `Vehicles` field.
[!code-cs[Classic XmlElementAttributes Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.serializati_39_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttributes Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.xml.serializati_39_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttributes Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.serializati_39_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 Add(class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute attribute) cil managed

Docs.returns: The zero-based index of the newly added item.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example creates two <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> objects and calls the Add method to add them to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes>. The example then adds the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttributes> to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>, which is used to create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that can serialize an instance of the `Transportation` class.
[!code-cs[Classic XmlElementAttributes.Add Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/82619be2-6549-426f-bf44-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlElementAttributes.Add Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/82619be2-6549-426f-bf44-_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[Classic XmlElementAttributes.Add Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/82619be2-6549-426f-bf44-_1.cpp)]
